entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:41 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sparwood Airport 7:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -7.1°C
Wind: W 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
